content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are a student. Therefore, I think 700 Euro per month is a reasonable price for this apartment. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is too low. Let's try to find a more suitable price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, then how about 750 Euro per month? This is a great apartment in the city center with easy access to all important facilities. It's a good deal for a student like you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for this apartment. Let's try to find a more suitable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, then let's make it 800 Euro per month. This is a fair price for such a nice apartment in the city center. I'm sure you'll enjoy living here.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for this apartment. Let's try to find a more suitable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, then let's make it 850 Euro per month. This is a high-quality apartment in the city center. I'm sure you'll be happy living here. This is the lowest price I can offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
